SourceProxy.label: OGS Gradient
SourceProxy.name: OGSGradient

Documentation.long_help: Estimate the gradient for each point or cell in any type of dataset.
Documentation.short_help: Compute gradients for any type of dataset.

SourceProxy.Documentation: The OGS Gradient filter estimates the gradient vector at each point or cell. It operates on any type of vtkDataSet, and the output is the same type as the input.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the input to the OGS Gradient filter.

StringVectorProperty.label: Scalar Array
StringVectorProperty.name: SelectInputScalars
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists the name of the scalar array from which to compute the gradient.

IntVectorProperty.name: ComputeGradient
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When this flag is on, the gradient filter will compute the gradient of the input array.

StringVectorProperty.name: ResultArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property provides a name for the output array containing the gradient vectors.

IntVectorProperty.name: FasterApproximation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When this flag is on, the gradient filter will provide a less accurate (but close) algorithm that performs fewer derivative calculations (and is therefore faster). The error contains some smoothing of the output data and some possible errors on the boundary. This parameter has no effect when performing the gradient of cell data or when the input grid is not a vtkUnstructuredGrid.

IntVectorProperty.name: ComputeDivergence
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When this flag is on, the gradient filter will compute the divergence of a 3 component array.

StringVectorProperty.name: DivergenceArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property provides a name for the output array containing the divergence vector.

IntVectorProperty.name: ComputeVorticity
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When this flag is on, the gradient filter will compute the vorticity/curl of a 3 component array.

StringVectorProperty.name: VorticityArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property provides a name for the output array containing the vorticity vector.

IntVectorProperty.name: ComputeQCriterion
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When this flag is on, the gradient filter will compute the Q-criterion of a 3 component array.

StringVectorProperty.name: QCriterionArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property provides a name for the output array containing Q criterion.

IntVectorProperty.name: ComputeLambda2Criterion
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When this flag is on, the gradient filter will compute the Lambda2-criterion of a 3 component array.

StringVectorProperty.name: Lambda2CriterionArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property provides a name for the output array containing Lambda2 criterion.

IntVectorProperty.name: ComputeOmegaCriterion
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When this flag is on, the gradient filter will compute the Omega-criterion of a 3 component array.

StringVectorProperty.name: OmegaCriterionArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property provides a name for the output array containing Omega criterion.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: epsi
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Epsilon:
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Small positive number used to avoid division per zero in the Omega criterion.

IntVectorProperty.name: ContributingCellOption
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify which dimensions of cells should be used when computing gradient quantities. Default is to use the dataset's maximum cell dimension.

IntVectorProperty.name: ReplacementValueOption
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify what value to use for when the gradient quantities at a point can't be computed with the selected **ContributingCellOption**.
